description: UI component mapping for BargeTokenColors (ColorPair) - Master-detail form for managing barge token color pairs

technologyStack.colorPicker: HTML5 color input + custom color name conversion

columns.dataTablesColumn: { data: 'textColor', name: 'textColor', defaultContent: '', render: function(data, type, row) { return '' + data + ''; } }
columns.notes: Display color name with colored text preview

columns.dataTablesColumn: { data: 'backColor', name: 'backColor', defaultContent: '', render: function(data, type, row) { return '' + data + ''; } }
columns.notes: Display color name with background color preview

{ data: null, name: 'actions', orderable: false, searchable: false, className: 'text-center', width: '100px', render: function(data, type, row) { return '

features: Visual color preview in grid cells

controlMappings.html: <input asp-for="Name" class="form-control" maxlength="50" placeholder="Enter color name..." aria-required="true" />

validation.htmlAttributes: data-val="true" data-val-required="Name is required" data-val-maxlength="Name cannot exceed 50 characters"

controlMappings.modernEquivalent: HTML5 Color Input + Color Name Converter

javascript.colorConversion: Convert hex to color name for storage, color name to hex for display

controlMappings.notes: Legacy stores color names (e.g., 'Red', 'Blue'), modern UI uses hex but converts to color names for database compatibility

javascript.colorConversion: Convert hex to color name for storage, color name to hex for display
javascript.notes: Store System.Drawing.Color names in database, convert to/from hex for web UI

controlMappings.notes: Legacy stores color names (e.g., 'Red', 'Blue'), modern UI uses hex but converts to color names for database compatibility

javascript.updateFunction: function updateColorPreview() { var textColor = $('#txtTextColorPicker').val(); var backColor = $('#txtBackColorPicker').val(); $('#colorPreview').css({ 'color': textColor, 'background-color': backColor }); }

html.addButton: Add New Color
html.cancelButton: Cancel

controlMappings.html: Search Criteria
controlMappings.usage: Group search criteria, edit form, grid results

controls.html: <input asp-for="Name" class="form-control" placeholder="Search by color name..." />

editForm.layout: Bootstrap card with form-label and form-control

concurrency.implementation: Include ModifyDateTime in hidden field, validate on update

colorConversion.description: Convert between hex colors (web) and System.Drawing.Color names (database)

functions.name: convertHexToColorName
functions.purpose: Convert hex color to closest named color for database storage
functions.implementation: Map common hex values to .NET color names (e.g., #FF0000 -> 'Red')
functions.notes: May need server-side helper for accurate conversion

functions.name: convertColorNameToHex
functions.purpose: Convert .NET color name to hex for color picker
functions.implementation: Map .NET color names to hex values (e.g., 'Red' -> #FF0000)
functions.notes: Server should send hex values in DTO for easy display

functions.name: updateColorPreview
functions.purpose: Update live preview with selected colors
functions.implementation: Read color pickers, apply to preview card

properties.name: TextColor
properties.notes: Store color name, display as hex

properties.name: BackColor
properties.notes: Store color name, display as hex

classes.purpose: Style color preview in grid cells

accessibilityFeatures.implementation: asp-for tag helper with associated input

migrationConsiderations.solution: Bidirectional conversion: store names in DB, display/edit as hex in UI
migrationConsiderations.implementation: Server-side helper to convert color names <-> hex, DTO includes both values

migrationConsiderations.legacy: Grid and edit controls on same form
migrationConsiderations.solution: Index.cshtml with DataTables grid, Edit.cshtml for add/edit operations
migrationConsiderations.implementation: Standard MVC pattern with separate views

migrationConsiderations.legacy: lblSample label updates on color change
migrationConsiderations.solution: JavaScript updates card background/text color on picker change
migrationConsiderations.implementation: Event handlers on color pickers calling updateColorPreview()

migrationConsiderations.modern: User selects fleet from dropdown or default from context
migrationConsiderations.solution: FleetID in ViewModel, Select2 dropdown, default from user context
migrationConsiderations.implementation: Controller sets default FleetID based on user's business unit

migrationConsiderations.legacy: Color names displayed as text only
migrationConsiderations.modern: Color names with visual color swatches
migrationConsiderations.solution: DataTables render functions apply inline styles for color preview
migrationConsiderations.implementation: Render functions use textColorHex/backColorHex from DTO

migrationConsiderations.modern: Same pattern with hidden field in form
migrationConsiderations.solution: Include ModifyDateTime in ViewModel, pass to update method
migrationConsiderations.implementation: Hidden input for ModifyDateTime, repository checks value

migrationConsiderations.solution: JavaScript confirmation dialog before delete AJAX call
migrationConsiderations.implementation: onclick="return confirm('Delete this color pair?')" or modal

commonMistakes: ❌ Using single color input without color name conversion
❌ Not providing visual color preview in grid
❌ Not including both hex and color name in DTO
❌ Forgetting to set FleetID before save
❌ Not handling color name validation (preventing '0' or empty)
❌ Using inline styles instead of Bootstrap classes
❌ Not implementing live preview update on color change
❌ Missing optimistic concurrency check with ModifyDateTime

views.sections: Search criteria card, DataTables grid card

views.controls: Name filter, Fleet dropdown, Search/Reset buttons

views.content: Table element with thead, DataTables populates tbody

views.controls: Name input, Fleet dropdown, TextColor picker, BackColor picker, Preview card

javascript.purpose: Edit form interactions and color preview

testingConsiderations.test: Verify hex-to-colorname and colorname-to-hex conversions match legacy behavior
testingConsiderations.validation: Common colors (Red, Blue, Green, etc.) convert correctly

testingConsiderations.test: Live preview updates when color pickers change
testingConsiderations.validation: Preview card shows selected text/background colors in real-time

testingConsiderations.test: DataTables grid shows color swatches correctly
testingConsiderations.validation: TextColor and BackColor columns display with visual color preview
Only color pairs for selected fleet display

testingConsiderations.test: Required fields enforced, max lengths respected
testingConsiderations.validation: Cannot save with empty Name or invalid colors

notes: Entity named 'BargeTokenColors' in UI but table is 'ColorPair' in database
Color values stored as .NET color names, must convert to/from hex for web UI
Legacy form was master-detail on single screen, modern uses separate views
No soft delete - hard DELETE operation requires confirmation
FleetID required but not always set on new records - handle in controller
Live preview is key UX feature - must update on color change
Grid should show visual color swatches, not just text names
Optimistic concurrency via ModifyDateTime - include in edit form as hidden field
Use DataTables for grid with server-side processing for consistency
Select2 for Fleet dropdown for enhanced UX
Bootstrap 5 for all styling - no inline styles
Accessibility: proper labels, aria attributes, validation messages
